name: Burning-Rune Demon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Burning-Rune Demon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for exactly two cards not named Burning-Rune Demon that have different names. If you do, reveal those cards. An opponent chooses one of them. Put the chosen card into your hand and the other into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.

name: In Search of Greatness
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the highest converted mana cost among other permanents you control without paying its mana cost. If you don't, scry 1.

name: Starnheim Courser
oracle_text:
Flying
Artifact and enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Every worthy warrior who arrives in Starheim is gifted a mount befitting their heroism, a mighty pegasus raised and trained by the valkyries.

name: Sethron, Hurloon General
oracle_text:
Whenever Sethron, Hurloon General or another nontoken Minotaur enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/3 red Minotaur creature token.
{2}{B/R}: Minotaurs you control get +1/+0 and gain menace and haste until end of turn. ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)

name: Resplendent Marshal
oracle_text:
Flying
When Resplendent Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, you may exile another creature card from your graveyard. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control other than Resplendent Marshal that shares a creature type with the exiled card.

name: Dragonkin Berserker
oracle_text:
First strike
Boast abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate for each Dragon you control.
Boast — {4}{R}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

name: Righteous Valkyrie
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another Angel or Cleric enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
As long as you have at least 7 life more than your starting life total, creatures you control get +2/+2.

name: Doomskar
oracle_text:
Destroy all creatures.
Foretell {1}{W}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: The realms crashed together, with Bretagard at the center of the calamity.

name: "Chill Out"
oracle_text: {S}, {T}: Tap target artifact or creature.

name: Invoke the Divine
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text: "Let's see how brave you really are behind all that oak and steel."

name: Weigh Down
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The draugr often drown intruders. Years later, their corpses rise from the depths to join the ranks of teh Dread Marn.

name: Orvar, the All-Form
oracle_text:
Changeling
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if it targets one or more other permanents you control, create a token that's a copy of one of those permanents.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, create a token that's a copy of target permanent.

name: Shackles of Treachery
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gains haste and "Whenever this creature deals damage, destroy target Equipment attached to it."
flavor_text: In that instant, Toralf felt only the power of the storm and the need to destroy.

name: Orvar, the All-Form
oracle_text:
Changeling
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if it targets one or more other permanents you control, create a token that's a copy of one of those permanents.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, create a token that's a copy of target permanent.

name: Brinebarrow Intruder
oracle_text:
Flash
When Brinebarrow Intruder enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Locked in the ice of Karfell, the treasures of ancient nobles await in ruins guarded by the dead.

name: Craven Hulk
oracle_text: Craven Hulk can't block alone.
flavor_text: Abandoned at birth, the giant was raised by goats. Ironically, it grew up to be the most cautious member of the herd.

name: "The First Snowman"
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Mill three cards.
II — Return up to two snow permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
III — Choose up to three cards in each graveyard. Their owners shuffle those cards into their libraries.

name: Immersturm Raider
oracle_text: When Immersturm Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: The demons took no captives and claimed no spoils; they sought only to destroy.

name: Dream Devourer
oracle_text:
Each nonland card in your hand without foretell has foretell. Its foretell cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {2}. (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile it from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
Whenever you foretell a card, Dream Devourer gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Jarl of the Forsaken
oracle_text:
Flash
When Jarl of the Forsaken enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: Immersturm Skullcairn
oracle_text:
Immersturm Skullcairn enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{1}{B}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Immersturm Skullcairn: It deals 3 damage to target player. That player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: The Bloodsky Massacre
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 2/3 red Demon Berserker creature token with menace.
II — Whenever a Berserker attacks this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
III — Add {R} for each Berserker you control. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps or phases end.

name: Port of Karfell
oracle_text:
Port of Karfell enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{3}{U}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Port of Karfell: Mill four cards, then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

name: Demonic Gifts
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."
flavor_text: It began as a flavor on the tongue, like a body morsel of roast boar—but soon the power was a conflagration in her veins.

name: Skull Raid
oracle_text:
Target opponent discards two cards. If fewer than two cards were discarded this way, you draw cards equal to the difference.
Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: Draugr Thought-Thief
oracle_text: When Draugr Thought-Thief enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into their graveyard.
flavor_text: The worst part is you won't even remember how much he's taken from you.

name: Blood on the Snow
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all planeswalkers.
Then return a creature or planeswalker card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell.

name: Provoke the Trolls
oracle_text: Provoke the Trolls deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I like burning and pillaging as much as anyone, but sometimes it's just easier to throw a rock and let the trolls do the work."
—Urik, Tuskeri raid leader

name: Icehide Troll
oracle_text: {S}{S}: Icehide Troll gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: A troll's greatest weapon is its ability to emerge unexpectedly from the landscape.

name: "Valley of Lights"
oracle_text:
"Valley of Lights" enters the battlefield tapped.
As "Valley of Lights" enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

name: "Priest of the Dam"
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice "Priest of the Dam": Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of snow lands you control. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: "Frozen Blessing"
oracle_text: Distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of creatures you control, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell. Then draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

name: Fearless Pup
oracle_text:
First strike
Boast — {2}{R}: Fearless Pup gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "Awooo!"

name: Frenzied Raider
oracle_text: Whenever you activate a boast ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Frenzied Raider>

name: Horizon Seeker
oracle_text: Boast — {1}{G}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "A five-day climb? Ha! I'll do it in two."

name: Tyrite Sanctum
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Target legendary creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Tyrite Sanctum: Put an indestructible counter on target God.

name: Svella, Ice Shaper
oracle_text:
{3}, {T}: Create a colorless snow artifact token named Icy Manalith with "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
{6}{R}{G}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Graven Lore
oracle_text: Scry X, where is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell. ({S} is mana from a snow source.}
flavor_text: The runes glow beneath the snow, bearing memories of a time when the old gods ruled the realms.

name: The Raven's Warning
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying. You gain 2 life.
II — Whenever one or more creatures you control with flying deal combat damage to a player this turn, look at that player's hand and draw a card.
III — You may put a card you own from outside the game on top of your library.

name: Immersturm Predator
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Immersturm Predator becomes tapped, exile up to one target card from a graveyard and put a +1/+1 counter on Immersturm Predator.
Sacrifice another creature: Immersturm Predator gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

name: Cosmos Elixir
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if your life total is greater than your starting life total. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The Skoti owe their immortality to the elixir, and the manner of its creation is their most closely guarded secret.

name: Immersturm Predator
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Immersturm Predator becomes tapped, exile up to one target card from a graveyard and put a +1/+1 counter on Immersturm Predator.
Sacrifice another creature: Immersturm Predator gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

name: Arni Brokenbow
oracle_text:
Haste
Boast — {1}: You may change Arni Brokenbow's base power to 1 plus the greatest power among creatures you control until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "I headbutted a troll. And won."

name: Frost Augur
oracle_text: {S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a snow card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: From the barest crack in the ice, she teases forth a swirling, living map of the Cosmos.

name: Battershield Warrior
oracle_text: Boast — {1}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "I need no axe to best these weaklings."

name: Rootless Yew
oracle_text: When Rootless Yew dies, search your library for a creature card with power or toughness 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"We are bound to wander this forest forever. Sometimes I think it wanders with us."
—Ogni, Kannah scout

name: Fynn, the Fangbearer
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals combat damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
flavor_text: "Come, Koma, and reclaim what you lost! Or does the great serpent fear a rematch?"

name: Return Upon the Tide
oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Elf, create two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.
Foretell {3}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
